title: About
text:
My name is Melody Liu, and I am a middle school student in Ontario, Canada. Contact me here! (melody.yuemeng.liu@gmail.com)
My project was created to represent plastic pollution throughout the world and over the years. Find my Gihtub repo for this project here! (https://github.com/mliu-13/plastic-pollution)
This project was part of Kaneâ€™s Free Data Science Course. Find more information about this course here!

title: Home
text: Plastic pollution kills up to 1 million people each year. This project looks at plastic production and pollution. I used data pulled from here (https://ourworldindata.org/), by Hannah Ritchie, Veronika Samborska and Max Roser. The relevant data frames were joined to analyze information about plastic around the world. Global production has been increasing at a rapid pace, and is predicted to continue doing so.
